api.name: ObExternalLinkDirective
api.usage: This directive is transparent and automatically enhance external links. It is applied by importing the ObExternalLinkModule.

inputs.name: rel
inputs.text: Defines the rel attribute value for external links.

inputs.name: target
inputs.text: Defines the target attribute value for external links.

inputs.name: icon
inputs.text:
Defines the presence and position of an additional icon that marks links as external.
It is strongly recommended, for accessibility reasons, that the icon is present.
